condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Equitable access to schooling for all children, including those with disabilities, is improved and continuity is granted including in humanitarian situations

description.narrative: In synergy with the WASH programme, two schools have benefited from improved learning environment including toilets and water for 329 students, including 158 girls, through UNICEF support. Thanks to the sensitization of the communities on education, the school management committees of 6 pilot schools of the inclusive approach have built up multifunctional spaces to provide the children a conducive environment for the inclusive approach. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:17/01/2020
